SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_status = 'Y'
AND item_barcode = #{itemBarcode}
AND name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND product_origin LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productOrigin},'%')
AND company LIKE CONCAT('%',#{company},'%')
AND keep LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keep},'%')

price ASC
price DESC

mapper.update: UPDATE item SET category_mid_id = #{categoryMidId}, category_large_id = #{categoryLargeId}, name = #{name}, product_origin = #{productOrigin}, unit = #{unit}, company = #{company}, keep = #{keep}, price = #{price}, item_status = #{itemStatus} WHERE item_id = #{itemId}
